attributes.action: Give Period (toilet) passes to Girls at school with their Period.
attributes.additional_details: I want the Government to create Period passes in Secondary Schools so Girls can have access to the toilet to change their pad/tampon and keep themselves neat without teachers saying they can't go to the toilet or having to leave the lesson without permission but urgency to go so they won't leak and make a mess of themselves and resulting in a Detention (for leaving the classroom without permission)
attributes.background: These period passes need to be identical to the toilet passes at their school so people won't need to know if a Girl has their period.It can be used 2-3 times a day .To check if student isn't lieing about their cycle, GP or a Guardian can verify it.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Give students a legal right to access school toilets when they have their period" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/718682
